description:
We need to accept content-types such as application/vnd.openstack.compute+xml and application/vnd.openstack.compute+json in v1.1 of the OpenStack API

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Versions-d1e1193.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Complex Content Types

comments.content:
We need to accept content-types such as application/vnd.openstack.compute+xml and application/vnd.openstack.compute+json in v1.1 of the OpenStack API

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Versions-d1e1193.html
